maple: read("transforms") ;# insert source of nimprodP2() and A051775() from the b-file in A051776 here..A006042 := proc(n)     A051775(n,n) ;end proc:L := [seq( A006042(n),n=1..1000) ]; # _R. J. Mathar_, May 28 2011
